title: Sidewall, Frieze And Ceiling Paper, 1890–1920
inscribed: Marked: "Fr. Beck & Co." in selvedge on pieces (b) and (c)
creditline: Gift of Sylvia Goodrich in memory of her grandparents, Orlando R. and Elizabeth Boyd Ballou
description: Light blue, white and metallic gold floral with scrollwork on gray-blue ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, Frieze And Ceiling Paper, 1890–1920.
1890–1920. Machine-printed. Gift of Sylvia Goodrich in memory of her grandparents, Orlando R. and Elizabeth Boyd Ballou. 1973-32-2-a/c.
